channel.title: SnowBlitz
channel.description:
Have been experimenting with Slick2d for the past couple of days and so far I've came up with this shitty game for the current contest. Still have to a lot of work todo(physics in this game are a joke right now, hoping to fix that up right now.)
Going to be a "screen-scroller"/tower-defense(you're the tower) type of game. As you advance into higher levels, the snow will go faster, and you will move faster (you cannot move backwards). Hopefully the levels will load generically.
So far I've implemented a very basic UI system, and a fairly decent widget system (UI contains, buttons and so forth -- the widget system contains shit like health bar, snow falling, etc). Hopefully to make the UI system a bit better by using JSON to develop widget/ui position, etc. After that a basic AI system.
Pics: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xTVN2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2dQ5U.png[/img]
